Sample Output

no solution
1 100 4  3 8 45 4 2 5 10 4 1 3 3 7 4 50 14 43 8  -> 45+5+7+43=100
1 100 4  3 8 45 4 2 6 10 4 1 3 3 7 4 50 14 43 8  -> 45+10+1+43=99
1 100 4  3 8 45 4 2 6 10 4 4 3 3 7 4 50 14 43 8  -> 45+6+4+43=98
